meanings.definition: A segment of a plant stem between nodes.
meanings.sent1: The internode of the stem connects two nodes together.
meanings.sent2: The internode of the plant helps in transporting water and nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The internode of the stem was so long that it looked like a bridge between the nodes.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the internode of the plant seemed like a highway for nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The internode of the stem was like a pipeline, carrying essential resources.
